Package Controller

Class TaxiTripController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.TaxiTripController
  • public class TaxiTripController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains necessary data of a taxi trip controller. Takes care of declaring, initializing, saving its values and being able to obtain them or setting all its cab attributes

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private TaxiTrip model  
      private TaxiTripView view  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TaxiTripController()
      This constructor method of taxi trip controller, initialize the model and view of taxi trip

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void confirmTaxiTrip()
      This method is used to show the options menu to the user so that he can choose one the method creates a loop until the user is satisfied with the data.
      void createMoreTaxiTrips()
      This method is used when the client asks to create or request another taxi trip the difference between this method and its similar one is that it again resets the scanner to avoid problems.
      void createTaxiTrip()
      This method is used to create the taxi trip makes use of requestTaxiTrip and confirmTaxiTrip
      TaxiTrip getTaxiTrip()
      This method is used to obtain the taxi trip once it has been updated
      java.lang.String getTaxiTripAddress()
      this method is used only to return the address of a taxi trip

      This method is used only to return the taxi trip cost.

      This method is used only to return the destiny of a taxi trip.

      This method is used only to return the number of passengers into a taxi trip.

      This method is used when the user enters a non-existent option

      This method is used when the user wants to enter his data again

      This method is used when the user wants the cost to be different

      This method is used to display customer data
      void requestTaxiTrip()
      This method is used to request the data from the client and update them within the taxi trip
      void requestTaxiTripAgain()
      This method is used for when the client wants to ask again to enter their data this method is different from the previous one since it resets the scanner before requesting the data again so as not to have errors

      This method is used to update or modify the taxi trip model

      • taxiTrip

        public int taxiTrip​(int requests)
        This method we summarize all the controller of the taxi trip We ask for a number that must be equal to 0 in order to create a taxi trip for the first time. Once the counter is created, it will be increased to 1. If the counter is greater than one, it means that the user has already requested a taxi more than once. taxi trip and makes use of the reset scanner to avoid conflicts.
        Parameters:
        requests - the number of taxi trips created
        Returns:
        the new number of taxi trips created
